short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enhances the user experience and provides additional features while using Flowie for Bitbucket Cloud app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
While using the extension is optional, it complements Flowie for Bitbucket Cloud app, by providing the following features and user interface improvements, that are not available using only the Bitbucket app by itself:
  - Replaces standard checks with Flowie's extended checks
  - Places Flowie's merge panel above the pull request description
  - Replaces standard pull requests page with Flowie's enhanced pull requests page  

You choose which features you want to enable or disable. 

Flowie is a Bitbucket Cloud app that extends standard Bitbucket functionality. You can find more information about Flowie on it's website https://flowie.app.
